description: This file defines a React component named Sidebar that renders a navigation sidebar with links to different sections of a web application. It includes internal navigation items with active state styling and an external link to API documentation.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A React component that renders a navigation link with active state styling based on current pathname.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main React component that renders the entire sidebar with navigation links and external documentation link.
